original_text: And this shall be the plague with which the Lord will strike all the peoples that wage war against Jerusalem: their flesh will rot while they are still standing on their feet, their eyes will rot in their sockets, and their tongues will rot in their mouths.
korean_text: 예루살렘을 친 모든 백성에게 여호와께서 내리실 재앙은 이러하니 곧 섰을 때에 그들의 살이 썩으며 그들의 눈동자가 눈구멍 속에서 썩으며 그들의 혀가 입 속에서 썩을 것이요

sentences.original_text: And this shall be the plague
with which the Lord will strike
all the peoples that wage war against Jerusalem
their flesh will rot while they are still standing on their feet
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 서 있을 때에 그 살이 썩으리라

sentences.original_text: their eyes will rot in their sockets
sentences.korean_translation: 그 눈구멍 속에서 그 눈이 썩으리라

sentences.original_text: and their tongues will rot in their mouths
sentences.korean_translation: 그 입 안에서 그 혀가 썩으리라
